2410.08961.title: Evaluating Federated Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks on Non-IID Data
2410.08961.paper_summary:
Federated Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks (F-KANs) have already been proposed, but
their assessment is at an initial stage. We present a comparison between KANs
(using B-splines and Radial Basis Functions as activation functions) and Multi-
Layer Perceptrons (MLPs) with a similar number of parameters for 100 rounds of
federated learning in the MNIST classification task using non-IID partitions
with 100 clients. After 15 trials for each model, we show that the best
accuracies achieved by MLPs can be achieved by Spline-KANs in half of the time
(in rounds), with just a moderate increase in computing time.
2410.08961.paper_summary_zh: 聯邦 Kolmogorov-Arnold 網路 (F-KANs) 已被提出，但其評估仍處於初始階段。我們提出 KANs（使用 B 樣條和徑向基底函數作為激活函數）和具有相似參數數量的多層感知器 (MLP) 在 MNIST 分類任務中進行 100 輪聯合學習的比較，使用具有 100 個客戶端的非 IID 分區。在每個模型進行 15 次試驗後，我們表明 MLPs 達到的最佳準確度可以在一半的時間（以輪次為單位）內由 Spline-KANs 達到，而計算時間僅適度增加。
